channel.title: Mind is a Prison on Lemenio
channel.description: Recent content in Mind is a Prison on Lemenio

item.title: Predetermined
item.description: You own your life. Forget about those predetermined thing, I am bored with it. Having walked around the numerlogy and astrology part to see what my future defines. Guess what? I always have the feeling of “prediciting the future”, rather than taking responsibility for my own action. I don’t say guidance is bad, it just don’t suit well with this guy. I suffered. I always have the feeling of anxious, regardless how fate is happening and keep slapping into my face and say “Hey!
